data.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
data.meta_description: Based on the beloved penguin brothers in DreamWorks Animationâs hit feature film, Madagascar, The Penguins of Madagascar tells the story of a group ofâ¦
data.text:
EPISODE 1

Launchtime / Haunted Habitat

Frustrated by their obnoxious lemur neighbors, the penguins decide to take a vacation...to the moon. / The penguins leap into action when a spooky noise frightens Marlene.

11 min Â· 7 Nov 2009 7

EPISODE 2

Operation: Plush & Cover / Happy King Julien Day

The popularity of stuffed Mort dolls causes Julien to sabotage the toys, prompting a recall. Maurice bribes the animals with candy so theyâll celebrate âKing Julien Day.â

11 min Â· 30 Mar 2009 7

EPISODE 3

Paternal Egg-Stinct / Assault & Batteries

Marlene discovers a lost egg and thinks the Penguins would be perfect egg watchers. / When Skipper steals Julienâs radio batteries, a wild chase gets them stuck in a kangaroo pen.

11 min Â· 1 Apr 2009 7

EPISODE 4

Penguiner Takes All / Two Feet High and Rising

Skipper and the penguins bet that they will win a game against the lemurs; Julien passes a "no feet touching" law and exiles Mort from the lemur habitat.

21 min Â· 20 Jan 2021 7

EPISODE 5

Tangled in the Web / Crown Fools

When the zoo installs web cams to bring in new visitors, Private accidentally becomes an Internet star. / Skipper accidentally causes King Julien to lose his beloved crown. Now the penguins go on a dangerous mission to retrieve the crown from the sewer.

11 min Â· 8 Apr 2009 7
